Accessories

  • Gamepads

    These provide basic controls for games and range from standard ones to specialized ones such as steering wheels and joysticks designed for specific game genres.

  • Headphones

    Quality headphones with a microphone allow gamers to have an enhanced audio experience and communicate with other players while gaming online.

  • Keyboards and Mice

    In some cases, gamers prefer to use a keyboard and mouse to play games, especially in the strategy or first-person shooter genres.

  • Docks

    These allow you to charge your consoles and connect them to other devices such as TVs or monitors.
